derivation: from a compound of G575 (ἀπολύτρωσις) and G3083 (ἀπολύτρωσις);
strongs_def: (the act) ransom in full, i.e. (figuratively) riddance, or (specially) Christian salvation
outline:
1. a releasing effected by payment of ransom
    1. redemption, deliverance
    2. liberation procured by the payment of a ransom
